title: What Was Running the Titanic Submersible? It Could Be a $49.99 Videogame Controller
description: Tech analysts said it’s not uncommon for videogame controllers to be used in other applications.

title: SoftBank's Masayoshi Son Says He's Focusing on AI Inventions
description: The CEO says he wants to invest more aggressively as tech stocks revive. “I want SoftBank to lead the AI revolution.”
